content.body:
Reading https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#dfn-distinguishable…

Why aren't callbacks and dictionaries distinguishable? Is it because functions can have properties, therefore be read as dictionaries?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text:
Reading https://webidl.spec.whatwg.org/#dfn-distinguishable…

Why aren't callbacks and dictionaries distinguishable? Is it because functions can have properties, therefore be read as dictionaries?

content.body: I was hoping to create a union/overload where something is treated as a callback if it's callable, otherwise treat it as a dictionary
